page.title: 02THE EARL OF TYRONE
page.content: This is the story of the Earl Of Tyrone.He was wanted for high-treason many years ago.High-treason was a crime against the king and was very serious so he fled from Scotland and hid in the Parish of Martin's Coombe.He had to go to Ladyswood which was at the top of the village because it was the only safe place.Soon the word got round that he was in Martin's Coombe and some Brigadiers set out to find him.They went down every allyway to find him and eventualy someone found him.He was carried down the road with his hands tied.The villagers rejoyst at the capture of the Earl. When they reached the beach they shot him and let him float out to sea. We carry on the tradition year after year and have lots of fun.
